00174 #define NB_IT_MAX_DEFINED 10000
00175 
00176 inline Solv_Petsc::Solv_Petsc()
00177 {
00178   read_matrix_=0;
00179 #ifdef PETSCKSP_H
00180   initialize();
00181   instance++;
00182 // Journal()<<"creation solv_petsc "<<instance<<finl;
00183 #endif
00184 }
00185 
00186 inline Solv_Petsc::~Solv_Petsc()
00187 {
00188   reset();
00189   instance--;
00190 // Journal()<<" destr solv_petsc "<<instance<<finl;
00191 }
00192 inline void Solv_Petsc::reset()
00193 {
00194 #ifdef PETSCKSP_H
00195   if (SolveurPetsc_!=NULL)
00196     {
00197       KSPDestroy(&SolveurPetsc_);
00198       finalize();
00199     }
00200   if (MatricePetsc_!=NULL)
00201     {
00202 // Destruction des vecteurs
00203       VecDestroy(&SecondMembrePetsc_);
00204       VecDestroy(&SolutionPetsc_);
00205       if (LocalSolutionPetsc_!=NULL)
00206         {
00207           VecDestroy(&LocalSolutionPetsc_);
00208           VecScatterDestroy(&VecScatter_);
00209         }
00210 // Destruction matrice
00211       MatDestroy(&MatricePetsc_);
00212 // Destruction DM
00213       if (dm_!=NULL)
00214         DMDestroy(&dm_);
00215     }
00216   initialize();
00217 #endif
00218 }
00219 
00220 #ifdef PETSCKSP_H
00221 inline void Solv_Petsc::initialize()
00222 {
00223   matrice_symetrique_=-1;
00224   preconditionnement_non_symetrique_=0;
00225   seuil_ = 0;
00226   seuil_relatif_ = 0;
00227   divtol_ = 0;
00228   nouveau_stencil_ = true;
00229   petsc_cpus_selection_ = 0;         //!< By default, 0 (no selection). 1 means: first petsc_nb_cpus_ CPUs is used, 2 means: every petsc_nb_cpus_ CPUs is used
00230   petsc_nb_cpus_ = Process::nproc(); //!< By default the number of processes
00231   different_partition_ = 0;          //!< By default, same matrix partition
00232   petsc_decide_ = 0;                 //!< By default, 0. 1 is OK but does NOT improve performance (rather decrease)
00233   convergence_with_nb_it_max_ = 0;
00234   nb_it_max_ = NB_IT_MAX_DEFINED;
00235   save_matrix_=0;
00236   mataij_=0;
00237   factored_matrix_="";
00238   solveur_direct_=no;
00239   controle_residu_=0;
00240   gpu_=false;
00241   amgx_=false;
00242   amgx_initialized_=false;
00243   block_size_=1;
00244   option_prefix_="??";
00245   dm_=NULL;
00246   MatricePetsc_ = NULL;
00247   SecondMembrePetsc_ = NULL;
00248   SolutionPetsc_ = NULL;
00249   SolveurPetsc_ = NULL;
00250   LocalSolutionPetsc_ = NULL;
00251   VecScatter_ = NULL;
00252 // Dev:
00253   ignore_new_nonzero_ = false;
00254   rebuild_matrix_ = false;
00255   allow_realloc_ = true;
00256   clean_matrix_ = true;
00257   if (instance==-1)
00258     {
00259 // First initialization:
00260       instance=0;
00261       char version[256];
00262       PetscGetVersion(version,256);
00263       Cerr << "******************************************************************************************" << finl;
00264       Cerr << "Commands lines possible for " << version << ":" << finl;
00265       Cerr << "-ksp_view : to have some informations on the solver/preconditioner used by PETSc." << finl;
00266       Cerr << "-info : to have among other informations on storage of matrices of PETSc." << finl;
00267       Cerr << "-log_summary : to have at the end of the calculation, informations about performances and memory." << finl;
00268       Cerr << "-log_all : trace all PETSc calls." << finl;
00269       Cerr << "-malloc_dump : to have at the end of the calculation the memory not deallocated by PETSc." << finl;
00270       Cerr << "-help : to know all the commands lines of PETSc including those related to the solver/preconditioner selected." << finl;
00271       Cerr << "******************************************************************************************" << finl;
00272       if (!disable_TU)
00273         Cerr << "NB: if you want to disable the wrinting of the *_petsc.TU file then specify the disable_TU flag in your datafile before reading the block of schema in time." << finl;
00274       else
00275         Cerr << "Reading of disable_TU flag => Disable the writing of the *_petsc.TU file."<< finl;
00276       PetscLogStageRegister("KSPSolve",&KSPSolve_Stage_);
00277     }
00278 }
00279 
00280 inline Solv_Petsc::Solv_Petsc(const Solv_Petsc& org):SolveurSys_base::SolveurSys_base()
00281 {
00282   initialize();
00283   instance++;
00284 // Journal()<<"copie solv_petsc "<<instance<<finl;
00285   read_matrix_=org.read_matrix();
00286   gpu_=org.gpu();
00287   amgx_=org.amgx();
00288   option_prefix_=org.option_prefix_;
00289 // on relance la lecture ....
00290   EChaine recup(org.get_chaine_lue());
00291   readOn(recup);
00292 }
00293 
00294 inline Solv_Petsc& Solv_Petsc::operator=(const Solv_Petsc&)
00295 {
00296   Cerr<<"Solv_Petsc::operator=(const Solv_Petsc&) is not coded."<<finl;
00297   exit();
00298   return (*this);
00299 }

00311 {
00312 public:

00316     name=n;
00317     value_=v;
00318   }

00323   };
